entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 p.m. NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 8:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9 except minus 13 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 except minus 13 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Snow with ice pellets overnight and with rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
